LanguageData.AvaliSightAugment.label: Avali vision augment
LanguageData.AvaliSightAugment.description: An augment enhancing vision. Especially useful for auditory-reliant races like Avali. Zoom included.
LanguageData.AvaliHearingAugment.label: Avali auditory augment
LanguageData.AvaliHearingAugment.description: Auditory augments is very popular among military, scientific and exploration packs.
LanguageData.AvaliCoolAugment.label: Avali cooling augment
LanguageData.AvaliCoolAugment.description: This augment allows users to survive in environments that are deadly hot to them.
LanguageData.AvaliHeatAugment.label: Avali heating augment
LanguageData.AvaliHeatAugment.description: This augment allows users to survive in environments that too cold for them.
LanguageData.AvaliEnviromentalAugment.label: Avali life support augment
LanguageData.AvaliEnviromentalAugment.description: This augment allows users to survive in environments which were previously deadly toxic to them.
LanguageData.AvaliPackLossAugment.label: Avali madness prevention augment
LanguageData.AvaliPackLossAugment.description: This augment prevents Avali from going mad from mental illness called Pack Loss.
LanguageData.PlasteelAvaliTalons.label: plasteel Avali talons
LanguageData.PlasteelAvaliTalons.description: A relatively simple method of increasing the damage Avali talons can do.
LanguageData.AvaliBasicLiveSupport.label: basic thermoregulation and life support system
LanguageData.AvaliBasicLiveSupport.description: All spacefaring Avali augmented with basic thermoregulation and life support system so they will not suffocate or boil alive immediately after landing on most planets. This system not designed to work in very harsh conditions without additional equipment or augments.
LanguageData.AvaliBasicLifeSupportDamaged.label: basic thermoregulation and life support system
LanguageData.AvaliBasicLifeSupportDamaged.description: All spacefaring Avali augmented with basic thermoregulation and life support system so they will not suffocate or boil alive immediately after landing on most planets. This system not designed to work in very harsh conditions without additional equipment or augments. This system was damaged leading to significant reduction it work efficiency, causing constant overheating of user's body even in relatively soft conditions.
